metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43082 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow')vulnerability in the stats-over-http plugin of Apache Traffic Server allowsan attacker to overwrite memory. This issue affects Apache Traffic Server9.1.0.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
